name: reStrike_VTA
description: Windows desktop application for taekwondo referees using Tauri and React

scripts.dev:fast: cd ui && npm run start:fast && cd ../src-tauri && cargo tauri dev --no-watch
scripts.build:fast: cd ui && npm run build:fast && cd ../src-tauri && cargo tauri build --release
scripts.clean: cd src-tauri && cargo clean && cd ../ui && npm run build -- --clean
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf src-tauri/target ui/build node_modules/.cache && cd src-tauri && cargo clean && cd ../ui && npm run clean
scripts.format: cd src-tauri && cargo fmt && cd ../ui && npm run format
scripts.optimize: npm run clean:all && npm run build:fast

author: damjanZGB
